title: GameTale: The Big Adventure of the Little Gremlin
description:
I am a Bulgarian author, who created an innovative GameTale book to teach my son that the choices we all make are ultimately our own responsibility. I released the Bulgarian book for free and its success went beyond my wildest dreams. Now I have released my GameTale in English for free, hoping to make a difference in the lives of children and parents alike. Coming up in Russian, Italian and Spanish. I share my work with the readers under Creative Commons.

More info:
---

Technical info:

GameTale_PDF - Suitable for PCs, tablets and other devices.
GameTale_iPad - Suitable for iPad2, iPad3 and so on. This is a FIXED-LAYOUT ePub3 file, and it will not be properly displayed on other devices with ePub reading software such a Calibre. If you want to open this file on other devices you can use Adobe Digital Editions, Azardi or Readium.
GameTale_Kindle - This is a FIXED-LAYOUT kf8 file. You need some kind of Kindle Fire device to display it properly.

---
I hope you enjoy my GameTale: The Big Adventure of the Little Gremlin!
Support GameTale Foundation, so we can keep creating high-quality innovative books and release them for free at
